about_the_game:
3ZENTREE is a 3d interactive node based information system.
The node could store useful information such as text, image, and web page.
You could adjust relations between nodes in 3d space.
It could help you collect ideas and thoughts, build a global map between information, trigger more creatives.

FEATURES
Collect webpage, articles, and images
Adjust the connection between node in 3d space
Clean style interactive
Edit node detail on the fly
Auto web page preview extraction
3D H5 webpage supported
Multiple Skybox background, UI themes
Save tree as .3ZEN file, with open format

TO BE DONE
VR Support
Mac Support
Line Grow Animation
Add PDF Support
Efficiency Improvements
And More...

fullgame.name: 三生之树3ZENTREE - 3D NODE BASED INFORMATION SYSTEM

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X Yosemite
  • Processor: Dual Core 3.0 GHz Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Iris 1536
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

name: 3ZENTREE - 3D NODE BASED INFORMATION SYSTEM Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: windows 7,8,10 64bit
  • Processor: i3 6500
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: gtx 450
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: windows 7,8,10 64bit
  • Processor: i3 8100
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: gtx 970
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
